title: Orphrey Band, 16th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic
Technique: two combined structures, 4&1 satin plus 2/1 twill
provenance: ex. coll. Antonio Vivés y Escudero
description: Band divided into rectangles; the top one showing the Annunciation, the central one showing the nativity and the next (incomplete) showing the top part of the presentation.

tombstone.epitaph:
Orphrey Band, 16th century.
16th century. Medium: silk, metallic
Technique: two combined structures, 4&1 satin plus 2/1 twill. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-740.
